stanza.line: But do thy worst to steal thy selfaway
For term of life thou art assuredmine
And life no longer than thy love willstay
For it depends upon that love ofthine
Then need I not to fear the worst ofwrongs
When in the least of them my life hathend
I see a better state to mebelongs
Than that which on thy humour dothdepend
Thou canst not vex me with inconstantmind
Since that my life on thy revolt dothlie
O what a happy title do Ifind
Happy to have thy love happy todie
But what so blessed fair that fears noblot
Thou mayst be false and yet I know itnot
